title: Apollo Wear Launcher for Watch
summary: Apollo is designed to allow you to quickly launch your apps from your wear.
description: This app does NOT support Pebble, Sony SmartWatch 2, Samsung Gear 2, Samsung Gear 2 Neo.Features:★ quick launch bar★ set quick start for frequently-used apps★ hide unwanted apps on watch★ support left-hand mode★ do not conflict with system slide gesture  ★ contain a watch face to display date and time, watch battery and weather (not necessary to use launcher)Notes:★ need to wait a while to show on watch after installation on phone★ need to start once after installation★ it's the 1st version. if there is a bug, please contact us instead of writing a bad review★ keep watch on connecting when hiding apps★ keep watch on connecting when setting shortcuts  Supported Devices★ LG Watch Urbane★ Sony Smartwatch 3★ Asus ZenWatch★ Moto 360★ LG G Watch★ Samsung Gear Live★ other android watches have not been tested. if there is an error, please contact us.  Google Community:https://plus.google.com/communities/110249640117649682836Email: wearmonster.cook+launcher@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Apollo-Wear-Launcher-for-Watch/1615194938698299?fref=ts
descriptionHTML:
This app does NOT support Pebble, Sony SmartWatch 2, Samsung Gear 2, Samsung Gear 2 Neo.
Features:
★ quick launch bar
★ set quick start for frequently-used apps
★ hide unwanted apps on watch
★ support left-hand mode
★ do not conflict with system slide gesture
★ contain a watch face to display date and time, watch battery and weather (not necessary to use launcher)
Notes:
★ need to wait a while to show on watch after installation on phone
★ need to start once after installation
★ it's the 1st version. if there is a bug, please contact us instead of writing a bad review
★ keep watch on connecting when hiding apps
★ keep watch on connecting when setting shortcuts
Supported Devices
★ LG Watch Urbane
★ Sony Smartwatch 3
★ Asus ZenWatch
★ Moto 360
★ LG G Watch
★ Samsung Gear Live
★ other android watches have not been tested. if there is an error, please contact us.


Google Community:https://plus.google.com/communities/110249640117649682836
Email: wearmonster.cook+launcher@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Apollo-Wear-Launcher-for-Watch/1615194938698299?fref=ts
comments: So, finally found the culprit of that annoying weather popup! Really liked this app! But not this way, dear Dev.  Get rid of that thing and I'll come back! I may would even pay for your app ;)  but not with those kind of adds
Has gotten to be very intrusive. Over the top pop adds that inhibits daily use. From a 5 star app to 0 star Just make add free one we will pay
I get the need to make money but you do not do that by thrusting intrusive adverts onto my phones screen while I am using the device.  Time to find an alternative app I'm afraid...

I will give you 1 star until you remove the weather pop up that keeps showing up at random. I agree with another review. "This is a useful app, but not important enough to get random ads like this". UNINSTALLED. I understand it costs to make but that way of doing it is just annoying.
Really liked the draw on my watch, but has really intrusive ads on your phone which isn't worth it. That is exactly how you get your app uninstalled!

Use this app all the time until you a ridiculous amount of pop up ads come on screen front about a week's ago loved this app until the now. Uninstalling do not even bother downloading this is now a spam app
